title: Doubt
content: Hi will we ever use html and java script (front end) coding languages throughout our course in cse aiml ever?

comments.body:
Yes.

You have a course called WebTech in 3rd sem, where you'll be using HTML, Js, CSS and MERN stack.
And regardless of that, proficiency with basic web dev skills is always good.
Okay thank you for letting me know
